name: Espresso
description: A classic Italian espresso, made with a single shot of espresso and served in a demitasse cup.

name: Cappuccino
description: A popular Italian coffee drink, made with equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and frothed milk.

name: Latte
description: A milky coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk, topped with a layer of frothed milk.

name: Americano
description: A simple coffee drink made with a shot of espresso and hot water.

name: Mocha
description: A chocolatey coffee drink made with espresso, steamed milk, chocolate syrup, and whipped cream.

name: Macchiato
description: A coffee drink made with a shot of espresso and a dollop of foamed milk.

name: Flat White
description: A coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk, similar to a latte but with less foam.

name: Iced Coffee
description: A coffee drink served over ice, with your choice of milk and sweetener.

name: Affogato
description: A dessert-like coffee drink made with a shot of espresso poured over a scoop of vanilla ice cream.
